entities.name: draco malfoy
entities.description: Draco Malfoy is mentioned as the one who is giving out a loud and scathing voice in the courtyard. He is described as being flanked by his cronies Crabbe and Goyle.

entities.name: colin
entities.description: Colin is mentioned as being flanked by Draco Malfoy in the courtyard.

entities.name: crabbe
entities.description: Crabbe is mentioned as one of Draco Malfoy's cronies who are flanking him in the courtyard.

entities.name: goyle
entities.description: Goyle is mentioned as one of Draco Malfoy's cronies who are flanking him in the courtyard.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is mentioned as giving out signed photos and being angry at Draco Malfoy.

relationships.description: Draco Malfoy is accompanied by Crabbe in the courtyard.
Draco Malfoy is accompanied by Goyle in the courtyard.
Harry Potter is giving out signed photos to the crowd.
Draco Malfoy and Harry Potter are in conflict, with Draco accusing Harry of giving out signed photos.
